title: Introductions
subtitle: Manage user introductions for this resource group
createSuccessDescription: The introduction has been successfully granted to the user.
createErrorDescription: An error occurred while granting the introduction: {{error}}
revokeSuccessDescription: The introduction has been successfully revoked from the user.
revokeErrorDescription: An error occurred while revoking the introduction: {{error}}
loadErrorDescription: Unable to retrieve introduction data. Please try again later.
